content.text: 2 tablespoons canned Chipotle peppers in adobo sauce, seeded and minced
content.eamr: ( ing-1 "2 tablespoons canned Chipotle peppers in adobo sauce, seeded and minced" )

content.text: 0) Place the mayonnaise and chipotle peppers into a food processor, and process until well blended.
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "Place"@3:8 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "the mayonnaise"@9:23 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-1 "chipotle peppers"@28:44 / FOOD )
		:gol ( tool-0-0 "a food processor"@50:66 / TOOL )
	)
	:inform ( ac-0-1 "process"@72:79 / AC
		:until ( cond-0-0 "until well blended"@80:98 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 1) Add a little bit more of the sauce if desired, I like to add about 1/2 teaspoon.
2) Transfer to a serving bowl, and stir in the green onion and sweet pickle relish.
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "Transfer"@3:11 / AC
		:gol ( tool-2-0 "a serving bowl"@15:29 / TOOL )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-2-1 "stir in"@35:42 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-2 "the green onion"@43:58 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "sweet pickle relish"@63:82 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)
